data.actual_result: They enter their phone number, enter the code they were sent, and then get told "You are being ratelimited!"
data.expected_result: They enter their phone number, enter the code they were sent, and then are able to interact with the server like normal
data.short_description: Double Tableflip servers don't allow you to actually do anything after you enter your verification code
data.steps_to_repro: - ANDROID BETA 3.8.9 SPECIFIC \*\*DO NOT DENY IF YOU DO NOT HAVE THE MOST RECENT BETA.\*\* - Create a server - Set it to Enhanced Tableflip, aka Double Tableflip - Have a user attempt to join
